definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: They had been working in the stream for a week but they hadn't panned out.
sentences.chinese: 他們在那條小河裏淘洗了一個星期，但沒有淘出金子。

sentences.english: The gold glinted in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 金子在陽光下閃閃發光。

sentences.english: Throughout their history, the pyramids of Giza have stimulated human imagination.
sentences.chinese: 縱觀歷史，吉薩金子塔激發了人類的想象。

sentences.english: They had been working the stream for 10 days, but it hadn't panned out.
sentences.chinese: 他們連續10天在這條小溪裏淘金，但還沒淘出金子。

sentences.english: That's the golden art of living dangerously.
sentences.chinese: 那是金子般的危險生活藝術。

sentences.english: For ten years, he led his men in the search for the buried gold.
sentences.chinese: 他帶領手下人，花了十年時間在尋找埋在地下的金子。

sentences.english: In the Most Holy Place he made a pair of sculptured cherubim and overlaid them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 在至聖所按造像的法子造兩個基路伯，用金子包裹。

sentences.english: So bring him incense, gold, and myrrh.
sentences.chinese: 給他帶來薰香，金子和沒藥樹脂。

sentences.english: The miser gloated over his gold.
sentences.chinese: 守財奴貪婪地看着他的金子。

sentences.english: And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work, and overlaid them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 在至聖所按造像的法子造兩個基路伯，用金子包裹。

sentences.english: Make certain that all their gold remains here with us. Their stores of food as well.
sentences.chinese: 確保他們的金子都在我們手上，還有儲備的食物。

sentences.english: Generally speaking , neither gold nor stone are soluble in water.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，金子和石頭都不能溶解於水。

sentences.english: The bold folk fold up the gold or hold it in hor.
sentences.chinese: 大膽的大部份人將金子摺疊起來拿在手裏。

sentences.english: He also wanted to take gold to buy things with.
sentences.chinese: 他一直想用金子去換購東西。

sentences.english: Separating the gold from the dirt was done in a washing cradle.
sentences.chinese: 將金子和沙子分開是用淘金槽完成的。

sentences.english: The gold landed in their stockings drying beside the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 這些金子掉入她們掛在壁爐烘乾的長襪中。

definition: silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
